author: plubird

comments.content: Nice curves....Any Caps in the works?
I'm currently try to make some caps! It is difficult because italic caps dont have special faces. Maybe I'll look at fraktur caps

Look at the df-Rialto typeface.

very nice but 'f' is so badly curved
